type ExtenderControl = class inherit Control interface IExtenderControl

summary.span: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你能够以编程方式添加的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 AJAX 功能。The class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control. 继承自类并实现接口。The inherits from the class and implements the interface. 类定义属性、 方法和共享的所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件。The class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls. 接口是一个抽象类，不能直接实例化。The interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 相反，你创建的派生的类型。Instead, you create a derived type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example shows how to use the class. 与此示例的教程，请参阅[创建扩展程序控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55)。For a tutorial related to this example, see [Creating an Extender Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55).
